snippet.title: Ultrawings 2 (Meta Quest 2) launch trailer!
snippet.description:
Welcome back to Ultrawings, Pilot!

Return to the skies in 5 all-new aircraft as you complete hundreds of missions across a beautifully stylized, island-themed world!

MOTION CONTROLS!

Our ground-breaking motion control system is back and better than ever!  Use your virtual hands to fully interact and control your aircraft. Don't forget to deploy your landing gear!

TONS OF GAMEPLAY!

There are over a dozen mission types! One minute you'll be dogfighting enemy bogies in the warplane and the next you'll be popping balloons in the Ultralight.  There's never a dull moment in the world of Ultrawings 2!

FEATURES

-- Pilot 5 unique aircraft (including a helicopter!) using your virtual hands for an unparalleled, incredibly immersive experience!

-- Explore all-new, hand-crafted islands.  

-- The world is teeming with life! 

-- Call down missiles, dogfight bogies,, strafe enemy vehicles, launch grenades using a grenade pistol,  and so much more.  

-- Harnessing the power of the Meta Quest 2  you can now travel seamlessly across all islands.  

www.bitplanetgames.com
